edu.rit.pj2.tracker

Class TrackerSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.tracker.Sender
      • edu.rit.pj2.tracker.TrackerSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrackerRef

    public class TrackerSender
extends Sender
implements TrackerRef
    Class TrackerSender provides an object for sending messages to a Tracker. A tracker sender must be attached to a Proxy before the tracker sender can be used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrackerSender()
      Construct a new tracker sender.
